SoilAnalysis.title: Soil Analysis
SoilAnalysis.subtitle: Enter or upload your soil test results for a detailed breakdown.

form.title: Submit Soil Data
form.description: Provide your soil, location, and climate data for a complete analysis and crop recommendations.
form.uploadText: Upload a photo of your soil report.
form.climatePlaceholder: e.g., Hot, dry summers with mild, wet winters. Average rainfall 20 inches.

results.loadingDescription: Our AI is preparing your soil report.
results.title: AI Soil Analysis Report

toast.noDataDescription: Please upload a soil report or fill in at least one of the main nutrient fields.
toast.errorDescription: Failed to analyze soil data. Please try again.
toast.geolocationNotSupportedDescription: Your browser does not support geolocation.
toast.locationFoundDescription: Set location to {locationName} and fetched climate data.
toast.fetchLocationErrorDescription: We found your coordinates but could not determine the location name or climate.
toast.locationAccessDeniedDescription: Please enable location permissions in your browser settings.

CropRecommendation.title: AI Crop Recommendation
CropRecommendation.subtitle: Get suggestions for suitable crops based on your soil, location, and climate.

form.title: Farm Details
form.description: Provide information about your farm to get tailored crop recommendations.
form.climatePlaceholder: e.g., Hot, dry summers with mild, wet winters. Average rainfall 20 inches.

results.loadingDescription: Our AI is finding the best crops for you.
results.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
results.description: Here are the top crop suggestions and their estimated seed prices based on your farm's details.
results.idleDescription: Fill out the form to get started.

toast.errorDescription: Failed to get crop recommendations. Please try again.

DiseaseIdentification.title: Image-Based Disease Identification
DiseaseIdentification.subtitle: Upload a photo of a crop to identify potential diseases using AI.

form.title: Provide Crop Image
form.description: Upload a photo or use your camera to capture an image of the affected crop.
form.uploadText: Drag & drop or click to upload
form.cameraAccessDeniedDescription: Please enable camera permissions to use this feature.

results.loadingDescription: Our AI is looking for signs of disease.
results.title: AI Diagnosis

toast.cameraNotSupportedDescription: Your browser does not support camera access.
toast.cameraAccessDeniedDescription: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings to use this feature.
toast.noImageSelectedDescription: Please upload or capture an image of the crop.
toast.errorDescription: Failed to identify disease. Please try again.

FertilizerRecommendation.title: AI Fertilizer Recommendation
FertilizerRecommendation.subtitle: Get tailored fertilizer suggestions for your specific crop and soil conditions.

form.title: Crop & Soil Details
form.description: Provide information about your crop and soil to get optimal fertilizer recommendations.
form.uploadPhotoDescription: We'll try to infer soil conditions from the image.
form.uploadText: Upload a photo of your crop.
form.analysisFailed: Could not analyze image. Please enter manually.
form.soilConditionsPlaceholder: e.g., Low in nitrogen, pH of 6.2, good drainage

results.loadingDescription: Our AI is tailoring suggestions for you.
results.title: Fertilizer Plan

toast.imageAnalyzedDescription: Inferred soil conditions have been filled in.
toast.analysisFailedDescription: Could not infer soil conditions from the image.
toast.errorDescription: Failed to get fertilizer recommendations. Please try again.
toast.geolocationNotSupportedDescription: Your browser does not support geolocation.
toast.fetchLocationErrorDescription: We could not determine your location name from your coordinates.
toast.locationAccessDeniedDescription: Please enable location permissions in your browser settings.

CropGuidance.title: Location-Based Crop Guidance
CropGuidance.subtitle: Discover which crops are best suited for your specific geographic location.
CropGuidance.locationDescription: We use your location to provide guidance on suitable crops.
CropGuidance.idleText: Click the button to get crop guidance for your area.
CropGuidance.suggestionsDescription: Based on general climate data for your coordinates.
CropGuidance.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
CropGuidance.unableToRetrieveLocation: Unable to retrieve your location. Please ensure location services are enabled.

corn.name: Corn (Maize)
corn.description: Thrives in warm weather with plenty of sunshine. Good for regions with hot summers.

soybeans.name: Soybeans
soybeans.description: Adaptable to various climates, but prefers warm, moist conditions.

wheat.name: Wheat
wheat.description: Typically grown in temperate climates, can be planted in fall or spring depending on the variety.

potatoes.name: Potatoes
potatoes.description: A cool-weather crop that is adaptable to many regions.

toast.fetchNameErrorDescription: We found your coordinates but could not determine the location name.

Marketplace.title: Fair Price Marketplace
Marketplace.subtitle: Buy and sell grains and produce directly from farmers.

MarketplaceBoost.title: Marketplace Offer Boost
MarketplaceBoost.subtitle: Use AI to analyze and improve the attractiveness of your marketplace listings.

form.title: Offer Details
form.description: Provide your offer details to get an AI-powered attractiveness score and suggestions.
form.adCopyPlaceholder: e.g., Fresh, Organic Wheat - Harvested Today!
form.productDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your product in detail. Mention quality, origin, and unique selling points.

results.loadingDescription: Our AI is scoring your listing and finding improvements.
results.title: AI Analysis Complete

toast.errorDescription: Failed to analyze the offer. Please try again.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Switch between light and dark mode.

account.title: Account
account.description: Manage your session by logging in or out.
